sourcing.instructions: 1. Iron(III) oxide (Fe2O3) - Chemical supply stores or online chemical suppliers.
steps: 1. Iron(III) oxide (Fe2O3) - Chemical supply stores or online chemical suppliers.
1. In a well-ventilated area, measure and combine 1200 g of Iron(III) oxide with 300 g of Technetium dioxide in a large mixing bowl.
preparation.raw_text: 1. In a well-ventilated area, measure and combine 1200 g of Iron(III) oxide with 300 g of Technetium dioxide in a large mixing bowl.

steps: 1. Turn off the oven and allow the mold to cool inside the oven for 1 hour.
cooling.raw_text: 1. Turn off the oven and allow the mold to cool inside the oven for 1 hour.

steps: 1. Once fully cooled, carefully remove the solid sample from the mold using the release agent.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Once fully cooled, carefully remove the solid sample from the mold using the release agent.
